ai-patthana21.1:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana21.1:1.1_0: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
ai-patthana21.1:2.1_0: Not seeing the cause or condition for the unskillful.
ai-patthana21.1:2.1_1: Not knowing the teaching of the skillful is a condition for the sake of skillful.
ai-patthana21.1:2.1_2: causes and conditions for the sake of skillful qualities that arise because of skillful qualities.
ai-patthana21.1:3.1_0: Not knowing the principle for the sake of unskillful.
ai-patthana21.1:4.1_0: No causes cause it to cause or condition for the reason why someone doesn’t arise.
ai-patthana21.1:4.1_1: No cause has not been declared by the reason for this.
ai-patthana21.1:4.1_2: No cause or reason for the sake of declaring whether or not for the sake of nation.
